DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded numeric response to identify whether blood pressure is abnormally high.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Blood pressure that is abnormally high._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: Blood pressure that is abnormally high.

Property.preferredDefinition: A subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Uncontrolled Systolic Blood Pressure Greater Than or Equal To One Hundred Fifty Or Diastolic Blood Pressure Greater Than or Equal To Ninety

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Uncontrolled Systolic Blood Pressure Greater Than or Equal To One Hundred Fifty Or Diastolic Blood Pressure Greater Than or Equal To Ninety
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not controlled, regulated, or constrained.: The maximum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart.: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.: A natural number greater than 149 and less than 151 and the quantity that it denotes.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: The minimum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during cardiac ventricular relaxation and filling.: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.: A natural number greater than eighty-nine and less than ninety-one and the quantity that it denotes.

Concepts.definition: The maximum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart.

A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A natural number greater than 149 and less than 151 and the quantity that it denotes.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
The minimum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during cardiac ventricular relaxation and filling.

A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A natural number greater than eighty-nine and less than ninety-one and the quantity that it denotes.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Control Systolic Blood Pressure Less Than One Hundred Fifty And Diastolic Blood Pressure Less Than Ninety

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Control Systolic Blood Pressure Less Than One Hundred Fifty And Diastolic Blood Pressure Less Than Ninety
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.: The maximum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart.: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A natural number greater than 149 and less than 151 and the quantity that it denotes.: An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.: The minimum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during cardiac ventricular relaxation and filling.: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A natural number greater than eighty-nine and less than ninety-one and the quantity that it denotes.

Concepts.definition: The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.
The maximum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than 149 and less than 151 and the quantity that it denotes.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
The minimum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during cardiac ventricular relaxation and filling.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than eighty-nine and less than ninety-one and the quantity that it denotes.
